issues.description: The problem statement specifies that the addGuestStudents method should take two parameters (an integer for the number of new guest students and a String for the reason), but the solution repository implements it with only one parameter (an integer), which contradicts the intended design and could confuse students about the required method signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify the addGuestStudents method in the solution repository to include both parameters as specified in the problem statement, for example: public void addGuestStudents(int numberOfNewGuestStudents, String reason) { ... }, and ensure the method body incorporates the reason parameter to align with the educational intent.
